verses.verse: There was a person from the Separatists — Nicodemus is the name belonging to him — a head person of the Jewish people.

This person came to Jesus at night and said to Him, "Rabbi, we realize that You have come out from God as a teacher. You see, no one is able to be doing these indicators that You do unless God is with him."
Jesus responded and said to him, "Amen, amen, I tell you, unless someone is born from above, he is not able to see the empire of God."
Nicodemus says to Him, "How is a person able to be born being an aged man? He is not able to go into the belly of his mother a second time and to be born, is he?"
Jesus answered, "Amen, amen, I tell you, unless someone is born from water and spirit, he is not able to go into the empire of God.
The thing that has been born from the physical body is a physical body, and the thing that has been born from the Spirit is a spirit.
You should not be amazed that I said to you, 'It is necessary for you to be born from above.'
The breeze (Spirit) blows where it wants, and you hear its voice, but you don't know where it comes from and where it goes back to. This is how everyone is who has been born from the Spirit."
Nicodemus responded and said to Him, "How are these things able to happen?"
Jesus answered and said to him, "You are the teacher of Israel, and you do not know these things?
Amen, amen, I tell you that what we know, we speak, and what we have seen, we tell that we witnessed it, and you do not receive our witness account.
If I told the earthly things to you and you do not trust, how will you trust if I tell you the heavenly things?
And no one has stepped up into the heaven, except the One who stepped down from the heaven, the Son of the Person, the One who is in the heaven.
And just as Moses put the snake up high in the backcountry, so it is necessary for the Son of the Person to be put up high
so that everyone who trusts in Him might not be ruined, but may have life that spans all time.
You see, this is how God loved the world in such a way that He gave His Son, the only biological Son, so that everyone trusting in Him would not be ruined, but may have life that spans all time;
for God did not send His Son out on a mission into the world so that He may judge the world, but so that the world might be rescued through Him.
The person trusting in Him is not judged, but the person not trusting has already been judged because he has not trusted in the name of the only biological Son of God.
This judgment is because the light has come into the world and the people loved the darkness rather than the light. You see, their actions were evil;
for everyone who repeatedly does useless things hates the light and does not come to the light so that his actions might not be reprimanded.
But the person doing the truth comes to the light so that it might be shown that it is in God that his actions have been worked."
After these things, Jesus and his students went into the Jewish land. And He was spending time there with them and submerging.
John also was in Aenon near Salim submerging because there was a lot of water there and people were showing up and being submerged.
You see, John had not yet been thrown into the jail.
So a questioning happened from the students of John with Jewish people about cleansing.

And they came to John and said to him, "Rabbi, the Person who was with you on the other side of the Jordan River, of whom you have told what you witnessed, look, this Person is submerging and all are going to Him."
John responded and said, "A person is not able to be receiving anything unless it has been given to him from the heaven.
You yourselves are witnesses of me that I said that I am not the Anointed King, but that I am a person who has been sent out on a mission in front of that Person.

The person who has the bride is a groom. But the friend of the groom, the person who has stood and is listening to him is happy with happiness because of the voice of the groom. So this, the happiness, my happiness, has been filled up.
It is necessary for that Person to be growing, but for me to be made less.
The Person coming from above is over all things. The person who is from the earth is from the earth and speaks from the earth. The Person coming from the heaven is over all things.
And the thing that He has seen and heard, He tells that He witnessed this, and no one receives His witness account.
The person who received His witness account put a seal on it that God is truthful;
for He whom God sent out on a mission speaks the statements of God. You see, God doesn't give the Spirit from a measurement.
The Father loves the Son and has given all things in His hand.
The person trusting in the Son has life that spans all time, but the person not believing the Son will not see life, but the punishment of God stays on him.
